Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage. Gain a cumulative +2 bonus to additional attack rolls with this power. If you hit the target with all three attacks, you inflict additional damage equal to twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Wear Them Down
Flavor: You pound upon your foe in hopes of breaking their spirit.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened and dazed until the end of your next turn. If you hit the target with both attacks, the target is weakened and dazed (save ends both) and cannot save until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lights Out
Flavor: You strike your opponent at a tender spot, just behind the head or under the jaw. Your enemy falls limp before you.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is unconscious (save ends). The moment the target takes any further damage, it immediately wakes up.
Miss: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.

Name: Off the Bone
Flavor: Your enemy’s tendons snap and bones break.
Hit: 4dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target suffers 10 persistent damage (save ends).
Miss: Half damage and 5 persistent damage (save ends).

Name: Blocking Pose
Flavor: You change your guard to withstand punishment from oncoming attacks.
Effect: Take half damage from all melee attacks until the start of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot maintain if you move from your square or an enemy scores a critical hit against you.

Name: Calculated Strike
Flavor: You make a quick determination upon the best course of action, choosing either accuracy or power.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: For every -2 penalty you accept on this attack (maximum -6) the attack deals +1dW damage.

Name: Spherical Discipline
Flavor: You lash at opponents all around, striking behind, in front, and in blind spots.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and weakened until the end of your next turn.
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Name: Master Combo
Flavor: Your opponents have never seen talent like this. Your resolve is absolute. There could be ten times more men against you and it still wouldn’t matter.
Effect: Use three at-will powers. You can select the same power multiple times.
Special: When you complete a streak, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Roundabout Strike
Flavor: After your opponent is temporarily dazed, you slide to another position for a follow-up attack.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage with each attack.
Effect:
Shift to any unoccupied square adjacent to the enemy and make a secondary attack.  
*Secondary Attack:*  Strength vs AC; 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and cannot stand (save ends).

Name: Flow Like Water
Flavor: You pass through enemy lines without worry, crashing into whatever foes you wish.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Shift to any square adjacent to the target.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against a different target.

Name: Sure-Kill
Flavor: One single strike is all you’ll need. You crush your opponent and strike fear into all those around with such a brutal act of violence.
Hit: 6dW + Strength modifier damage, and all enemies in a burst 5 of the target are stunned until the end of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage, and enemies are not stunned.

Name: Chapter
Details: You are an inspiring leader who throws themselves into the thick of battle.

Name: Pack Pounce
Flavor: By capitalizing on the opportunities granted by the presence of your allies who are attacking your foe, your lethality increases dramatically due to your knowledge of pack tactics.
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, +2 for every ally that is adjacent to the target.
Level 21: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, +4 for every ally that is adjacent to the target.

Name: Tactical Strike
Flavor: Any commander knows that in battle, footwork is key. By utilizing this theory, you help your comrades to understand this.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage. Choose an ally within 2. They can shift 2.

Name: Demoralizing Roar
Flavor: With a shout of rage and defiance, you wade into battle with fearless determination, shattering the resolve of your foes.
Hit: Target is dazed (save ends)
Miss: Target is dazed until the end of their next turn

Name: Hunting Party
Flavor: When two or more soldiers converge on a single target, the odds of victory increase and with the knowledge of this strike you can assist your comrade’s potential lethality.
Trigger: An ally hits an enemy
Effect: Another ally within range of the enemy (including yourself) makes a basic attack (melee or ranged) against the enemy.

Name: Pride Movement
Flavor: By having a watchful eye on the flow of combat, you know when to spur an ally into a better position.
Effect: The target can take a move action right away,

Name: Distracting Strike
Flavor: By attracting the attentions of a foe with a well-placed and vicious blow, you may distract and weaken your foe to the predations of your allies.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Defending the Pride
Flavor: With a cry to defend themselves from incoming attacks, the inspirational words of the disciple aid your allies in your defense.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Allies within 5 receive a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

Name: Circling the Prey
Flavor: With practiced precision and a quick shout, you and your allies move in unison for better strategic advantage.
Effect: You and all allies in range shift 1.

Name: Warning Roar
Flavor: Witnessing a clear and present danger to an ally, you shout out a well-timed warning and aid your ally in defending against an attack.
Trigger: An ally in range is hit by an attack.
Effect: The attacker must reroll their attack and use the second result.

Name: Pyrite Swipe
Flavor: With a powerful strike, you push your foe into the waiting arms of your allies and their hungry blades.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage and push the target 2. Each ally that is in reach of the target at some point during its move may make a melee basic attack against it.
Boost:
**Level 17** 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and shunt the target 4 squares.  
**Boost Level 27** 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and shunt the target 8 squares.

Name: Kill the Wounded
Flavor: You make a ferocious assault on your foe, opening the enemy’s defenses to the attacks of your allies.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: The target gets vulnerability to all damage 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Direct the Pride
Flavor: Cooperation and teamwork form the backbone of tactical warfare, and through your knowledge of all of these things, you may help direct the actions of your ally to greater effectiveness.
Range Details: burst 5, one ally that has not yet acted this turn
Effect: The ally moves up in the initiative order to act just after your turn ends.

Name: Golden Lion Charger
Flavor: A student of the art of war, you know that sometimes a powerful opening charge can be the edge the warrior needs.
Effect: While you are in this stance, allies in range, including yourself, add your Charisma modifier to damage when attacking during the Charge action.

Name: Charge of the Battle Cat
Flavor: Like the charge of the mighty lion as he takes his prey to the ground, you charge into battle, heedless of your enemies, to crash into your chosen foe with a mighty strike, knocking them to the ground at your feet.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target falls prone.
Special: Before your attack, move up to your speed.

Name: Golden Swipe
Flavor: With a series of furious blows against your foe, you batter them into the waiting blades of your allies.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: The target is pushed 6 squares. Each ally that is in reach of the target at some point during its move may make a melee basic attack against it.

Name: Harry the Prey
Flavor: Through coordinated tactics, the comrades at your side may act as one.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Allies within 5 squares of the target can make a basic melee attack against a target of their choice, or a basic ranged attack against the target of your attack.

Name: Guard the Pride
Flavor: You trust in your heavenly sense of the battle around you to see where the next attack is coming and move away from danger.
Effect: You and all allies receive a +10 power bonus to attack rolls. Each time an attack misses one or more of you, the bonus decreases by 2 until it reaches +0, at which point this power ends.

Name: Roar of Battle
Flavor: You deliver a telling blow, shattering bones and piercing defenses alike as you press the foe into opening vital places for your allies to gain purchase.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target gets vulnerability to all damage 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Strategic Blow
Flavor: With a tremendous strike, you confuse the enemy and create an opening for an ally to reposition themselves.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Allies within 5 of the target can immediately shift 2 as a free action.

Name: Golden General’s Stance
Flavor: A beacon of victory upon the field of combat, you personify glory in combat and those in your presence may share in your prowess.
Effect: Allies within 5 receive a +2 power bonus on attack rolls. If they score a critical hit, they add your Charisma modifier to the damage.

Name: Lord of the Pridelands
Flavor: Proving you are the undisputed master of war, you call for absolute and crushing victory through overwhelming force of numbers.
Effect: While you are in this stance, allies within 10 can use your Strength attack bonus instead of their own for any melee attacks that they make. You can end the stance with a swift action.

Name: War Lion’s Charge
Flavor: With the ferocity of an angered lion, you race across the battlefield ignoring secondary targets to bear down on a single enemy and reduce them to dust.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn
Effect: Half damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lion Lord’s Agony
Flavor: With a fury born of desperation and determination for victory, you pour your pain into your swings so that the enemy may drink deeply of it.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and push the target 2.

Name: Triumphant Lion’s Leadership
Flavor: The power and majesty of the lion lords of the wild lives within you, so much so that your victories are a victory for your allies.
Trigger: Your ally is the target of an attack
Hit: 7dW + Strength modifier damage, and the attack that triggered this power misses.
Miss: Half damage. If the triggering attack hits, it does half damage.
Effect: The ally in question can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.
Special: Before your attack, shift up to twice your speed.

Name: Chapter
Sources: Embodies Intelligence, Worships the God of Peace (kits)
Details: You are a clever fighter who can size up your opponents.

Name: Outthink & Outwit
Flavor: You quickly ascertain your enemy’s eye movements and body language and determine the best course of action.
Hit: The target grants combat advantage to you and all allies until the start of your next turn.

Name: Instant Analysis
Flavor: You study your opponent and gauge what their strengths are as well as possible weaknesses.
Hit: You learn the target’s attack modifiers, all defense values, and the damage capacities of its attacks. The target is rattled until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The rattled condition persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: No Sweat
Flavor: You take everything in stride.
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to your next Intelligence- or Wisdom-based skill check.

Name: Evasive Action
Flavor: Your talent to avoid attacks is legendary.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make any attack against you that does not target at least one other creature.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You cannot maintain if you miss.

Name: Flash of Brilliance
Flavor: In an instant, thousands of possible outcomes race by, and you realize the best course of action
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses and a +5 power bonus to all skill checks against the target.

Name: Think Things Through
Flavor: You stop and consider your opponent’s weak spot.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target’s highest defense value is reduced by 4. All other defenses are reduced by 2. Remove any marks the target has placed on you or your allies. You and each ally can immediately make a saving throw against one condition inflicted by the target.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You cannot maintain if you miss.

Name: Flash of Violence
Flavor: You outmaneuver your enemies, allowing yourself a chance to escape.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit:
Choose one of the following benefits to apply until the end of the encounter:  
● You gain a +2 power bonus to all attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to all damage rolls against the target; or  
● You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against the target’s attacks

Name: Improvisational Desperation
Flavor: Well, it should work … in theory.
Effect: Use one of your daily or encounter powers. You may choose a power that is already expended. If you choose a power that is not expended, this use of the power does not expend it.

Name: Two Steps Ahead
Flavor: You remember the fundamentals of strategy from playing games of chance. You apply what you know in the combat field.
Effect: Add your Intelligence modifier to all defenses until the end of your next turn. All movement you make until the end of your next turn is considered a shift.

Name: Sweep Terrain
Flavor: You gain a lay of the land and instantly recognize where to take advantage of beneficial environment.
Effect: The target can shift its speed -2. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target has cover of any sort, the penalty to attack rolls against it increases by -2.

Name: Well-Informed Hypothesis
Flavor: Everything that just happened was in your head, the result of you balancing the benefits of your action.
Trigger: You end your turn but don’t like the results of it.
Effect: Redo your entire turn. Everything that occurred during your turn did not occur.

Name: Game Theory
Flavor: It can all be boiled down to mathematics.
Hit: You gain the target’s defense values (if higher than yours) and basic attack bonus (if higher than yours) until the end of your next turn. If the target’s values are lower than yours, you gain a +2 bonus to yours.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You cannot maintain if you are staggered or the target scores a critical hit on you.

Name: Focus Weakness
Flavor: You know this enemy well and know what to do to inflict the most harm.
Hit: Until the end of the encounter, you learn all of the target’s powers, defense values, and characteristics. In addition, you score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18, 19 or 20 and if you score a critical hit, the target takes 1dW extra damage.

Name: Thousands of Calculations
Flavor: Every outcome, every possible consequence, repeats in your head until you decide a course of action. The strain of thinking this quickly can get to some people.
Effect: Roll twice for your next attack roll or skill check and take the better result value. Take damage equal to half your level.
Special: This power can only be used once per round.

Name: Natural Instincts
Flavor: The last attempt worked so well, you try it again, hoping for the same result.
Effect: You recover the attack power you last used and immediately use it again. You cannot reuse a power that is being maintained.

Name: Prodigy
Flavor: You are a natural predator.
Effect: Use any encounter power you know that you have not yet expended. This use of the power does not expend it.

Name: Burning Up
Hit: 5 persistent fire damage (save ends). *Level 21:* 10 persistent fire damage (save ends).
Special: *Augment 2:* Also affects all enemies within 10 that are occupying zones you have created.

Name: Dreamstone
Range Details: wall 1 within range 10, all creatures in the wall
Hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage and shunt the creature 1. *Level 21:* 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage and shunt the creature 1.
Effect: The wall is not solid, but it does conceal creatures within or beyond it. Creatures that end their turn in the wall take damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Special:
*Augment 1:* Also shunt the target 1 on a hit.  
*Augment 2:* Wall 5. Also shunt the target 1 on a hit.

Name: Gloom
Effect: All targets of the target are concealed.
Special:
*Augment 1:* All targets of the target are concealed (save ends).  
*Augment 2:* All targets of the target have full concealment (save ends).

Name: Gooey Eruption
Hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and slowed (save ends). *Level 21:* 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and slowed (save ends).
Special:
Targets can end all save-ends conditions immediately by moving so they are not adjacent to the user or any zones the user has created.  
*Augment 1:* Target is also dazed (save ends).  
*Augment 4:* Target is also dazed (save ends). Make the attack against targets up to your Wisdom modifier in or adjacent to you or any zones you have created.

Name: Hallucinations
Hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and the target cannot benefit from combat advantage until the end of your next turn. *Level 21:* 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and the target cannot benefit from combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Special:
*Augment 1:* Also cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.  
*Augment 4:* Also cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn. Make the attack from all of your zones.

Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Range Details: 10, one creature in one of your zones
Effect: The target falls prone.
Special:
*Augment 1:* The target also falls 4 squares, then place in an unoccupied space adjacent to the zone.  
*Augment 4:* The target also falls 4 squares, then place in an unoccupied space adjacent to the zone. Applies to every zone of yours you choose within range.  
*Augment 6:* The target also falls 4 squares, then place in an unoccupied space adjacent to the zone. Applies to every zone of yours you choose within range, and to every creature that moves onto or begins their turn on the affected zones. Duration: End of your next turn. Sustain: Swift.

Name: Phantasmal Leap
Range Details: 10, one creature within 5 of one of your zones
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and move the zone to be centered on their space. *Level 21:* 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and move the zone to be centered on their space.

Name: Dreamwalkers
Effect: The target can choose to ignore the effects of any of your zones until the end of the encounter.

Name: Illusory Feast
Effect: For creatures of your choice within 6 of a residue, pull 2 towards the closest residue. If any move onto your residue, they are dazed (save ends).

Name: Dream Eater
Range Details: burst 5, one continuing power with the Illusion tag
Hit: The power's duration ends immediately, and you may spend a recovery to heal your recovery value.
Special: If the target is your own power, you do not need to make an attack.

Name: Sudden Valley
Effect: Your *dream residue* sinks 6 squares into the ground, making it hazardous terrain. Each creature that is on the residue takes the appropriate amount of falling damage (typically 3d10) and lands prone in the closest unoccupied square to the *dream residue*. Creatures subject to unwilling movement can make a saving throw to fall prone just before moving onto the *dream residue* while it is hazardous terrain. This effect persists until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the effect.

Name: Shifting Scape / Scuttling Residue
Effect: You may move each of your zones a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Name: Tesseract
Effect: A creature on one of your residues can teleport to another residue in sight as a free action, even during a move. This effect persists until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the effect.

Name: Figment Form
Range Details: burst 10, one residue on an unoccupied square
Effect: The residue is dispelled. Conjure a minor dream figment in that square. The minor dream figment occupies its space. At the start of each of your turns, it makes an attack (Intelligence vs AC, 2d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage). It can also make opportunity attacks. Move it up to your Charisma modifier spaces as a move action. The minor dream figment remains until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Hidden Grove
Effect: Creatures in a zones you have created are invisible to any creature not in a zone or in a zone but not one that you have created, until the end of your next turn.

Name: Dream Construct
Range Details: burst 10, one residue on an unoccupied square
Effect: The residue is dispelled. Conjure a Medium dream construct in that square. At the start of each of your turns, it makes an attack (Intelligence vs AC, 3d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage). It can also make opportunity attacks. Move it up to your Charisma modifier spaces as a move action.
Special:
*Augment 1:* The dream construct's attack, if it hits, also knocks the target prone.
*Augment 4:* The dream construct can charge as a standard action. If it hits, it does an additional 1d10 damage.

Name: Rested Mind
Effect: You regain 2 power points.

Name: Summon Mournwraith
Flavor: You call up a cloaked being that pursues the target, eating them with its hand-mouths where possible.
Range Details: burst 10, one residue on an unoccupied square
Effect: The residue is dispelled. Conjure a mournwrath in that square. Identify a target for the mournwrath. The mournwrath occupies its space. At the start of each of your turns, it flies up to 6 and, if possible, makes a melee attack (Intelligence vs AC, 4d10 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage) against the target. The mournwrath can make opportunity attacks against any enemy of yours.

Name: Dream Prison
Effect: The target disappears (save ends).

Name: Chapter
Details: You are sturdy and powerful, and it is almost impossible to take you down or hold you back.

Name: Devastating Body Attack
Flavor: You make the target think it just got struck by a gorilla … riding a horse.
Range Details: weapon, one creature up to one square out of reach
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. If the target cannot be pushed because of an obstruction, you inflict maximum damage.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Before your attack, shift up to one square towards the target. This must bring the target within reach.

Name: Inconsequential Injury
Flavor: Nothing clears the head like hurting something else.
Effect: Select one condition you suffer from. Gain a +4 bonus to the saving throw against that condition until you pass. When you pass, you gain two basic attacks.

Name: Knock-About Strike
Flavor: You leave your opponent reeling.
Effect: Make a basic melee attack. If you hit, the target is also rattled until the end of your next turn.

Name: For the Common Honor
Flavor: In an instant, you weigh the options and realize someone else’s life is more vital than your own.
Trigger: One staggered ally in range is hit by an attack that does not include you.
Effect: You are hit by the attack instead of the ally.

Name: I’m the Juggernaut
Flavor: You ignore any obstacles as you plow through terrain and opponents.
Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier, ignoring difficult terrain. You can move through enemies’ squares during this movement. Non-creature obstructions in squares you attempt to enter take damage equal to 5 × your Strength modifier: if this destroys the obstruction, you can enter the square.

Name: The Behemoth
Flavor: You lift up a few inches and widen your stance. You find a newly found surge of adrenaline.
Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Strength modifier.
Special: Use a standard action and a move action instead of a swift action with this power and gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Constitution and Strength modifier.

Name: Out of the Fire
Flavor: You know when to fight and when not to. You grab an ally and pull back.
Trigger: You hit one creature
Effect:
The target takes 1dW extra damage from the triggering attack.
*Secondary Effect:* You and one adjacent ally can shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Strength modifier. You and the ally must be adjacent at the end of the shift.

Name: Wade In
Flavor: A powerful blow tells your foes to bring it on. You are ready.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target is dazed until the end of their next turn.
Effect: You gain resistance to all damage 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Once More Into the Breach
Flavor: Despite injuries and your brain telling you you’re done, your body refuses to fall.
Requirement: You must be staggered.
Effect: You regain hit points equal to twice your Strength modifier plus twice your Constitution modifier.

Name: The Bulldozer
Flavor: You slowly approach your enemies, pushing your advancing line and claiming more of the battlefield.
Effect: While you are in this stance, you have resistance 5 to all damage. You can shift 1 as a swift action, but you must shift towards the nearest enemy.

Name: He Ain’t Heavy
Flavor: You grab a fallen ally and throw them over your shoulder as you withdraw.
Range Details: burst 6, one unconscious or otherwise helpless ally
Effect:
Shift into the ally’s occupied square.
*Secondary Effect:*  Make a basic attack.  One hit creature takes 2dW extra damage
*Miss:*  Half damage
*Tertiary Effect:*  Shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Constitution or Strength modifier, and shunt the target with you.

Name: The Runaway Boulder
Flavor: You barrel through terrain and people and anchor yourself further up the line.
Effect: Shift your speed +2. Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance 10 to all damage.
Special: If you complete a streak, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Like An Elephant
Flavor: You offer your shoulder to enemies you plow through, slamming them back and clearing a way.
Range Details: weapon, each enemy in reach during your shift
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.
Effect: Before your attacks, shift your speed. You can pass through enemy occupied squares.

Name: Down Fighting
Flavor: You ignore all those pesky holes and bleeding wounds. You refuse to accept humiliation. You will not fall before winning a fight.
Trigger: You are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you are dazed, but do not fall unconscious, make death saves, or die from reaching your negative staggered value in hit points; you also gain a +4 power bonus to all attack and damage rolls.
Special: If you are still alive at the end of the encounter, you automatically stabilize at 0 hit points.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. If you do not hit with an attack before the start of your next turn, you are considered to have failed a death save.

Name: The Fortress
Flavor: You’re an immovable object, a rooted post for allies to rally back to.
Effect: You gain regeneration 5 until the end of your next turn. You grant cover to all allies in adjacent squares, regardless of line of sight.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You cannot maintain if you leave your current square.

Name: In The Face
Flavor: An enemy raises a club, sword, or any other archaic implement of barbarity and you respond with your own medieval response.
Trigger: One enemy hits you with an opportunity attack.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage, and the attack misses.
Boost: **Level 17** 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and the attack misses.

Name: Nosebleed
Flavor: You sniff up the blood, bark loudly, and assault the newly frightened enemy.
Trigger: One enemy hits you with an attack.
Effect: The hit inflicts no damage. Make a basic attack: one hit creature takes 1dW extra damage.
Boost: **Level 29** After you make your basic attack, you gain a +2 bonus to all attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter against the triggering enemy.

Name: Just Got the Wind Knocked
Flavor: What? Nah, nah, I’m doing just fine.
Trigger: You take damage from an attack.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you suppress all effects of the attack. At the end of the encounter, you immediately suffer these effects.

Name: Just Walk It Off
Flavor: You know perfectly well how much damage was done. You attempt to ignore it and continue the fight.
Requirement: You must be staggered.
Hit: 4dW + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage.
Effect: Spend a recovery and regain double your recovery value.

Name: Blatant Disregard for Personal Safety
Flavor: You walk in the open, brazenly approaching your foe without care or concern.
Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. Make three basic attacks at any point during the move. Each time you miss with an attack roll, you can spend a recovery and heal your recovery value in hit points.

Name: Behind Me!
Flavor: Your ally uses you as cover as you march towards your enemy.
Effect: Each target can shift its speed. They must remain in adjacent squares at the end of the move. Each target can use one attack power at any point during the move. Until the end of your next turn, you grant cover to adjacent allies.

Name: Chapter
Details: You are a slippery, taunting combatant who can fool even skeptical foes.

Name: Biting Taunt
Effect: When you enter this stance, you may mark one creature within 10 squares. While you are in this stance, creatures you have marked do half damage on any attack that does not include you as a target.

Name: Failure to Communicate
Flavor: Events are not moving in your favor. You act in the best interest of the situation.
Effect: Make a basic attack. After the attack, you can shift a square.
Special: If the creature you attacked as part of this action misses you with an attack before the start of your next turn, you can make a basic attack against it as a reaction.

Name: Tricky Taunt
Effect: When you enter this stance, you may mark one creature within 10 squares. While you are in this stance, creatures you have marked provoke an opportunity attack from you if they miss you with an attack. You can make basic ranged attacks for opportunity attacks triggered by this power.

Name: Who, Me?
Flavor: You claim ignorance in the situation, acting as the innocent or an ally of the opposite side. You seem trustworthy enough.
Range Details: burst 10, three creatures not within 3 of you
Hit: The target cannot make melee or ranged attacks against you until the start of your next turn. If you mark or inflict damage on the target, the effect ends and the target is immune to this power until the end of the encounter.

Name: Exploit Weakness
Flavor: Your enemy is not angry as much as confused by what you just said.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is immobile until the end of your next turn. If the target takes any damage from you or your allies, it immediately recovers from this effect.

Name: Personal Betrayal
Flavor: The enemy wasn’t expecting your attack. It wasn’t even sure you were an enemy. Well, now it knows.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see that you have not damaged this encounter
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, whenever you make a damage roll against the target, you gain a power bonus to the roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn.

Name: Forked Tongue
Flavor: The target is swayed by your magnetic charisma, the tone of your voice, and your general attitude.
Range Details: burst 5, one creature you can see
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, your allies have concealment against the target and you gain a +3 power bonus to all Diplomacy and Bluff checks against it. If the target takes any damage while this power is in effect, it is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn, until the target takes damage or until you take damage, whichever comes first.

Name: Parley
Flavor: You convince your enemy to settle down and pause, at least for a moment. It may not last, especially if an ally is aggressive.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is stunned (save ends). If the target takes any damage or is moved, the effect immediately ends and the target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Name: Grace Under Pressure
Flavor: You are suave and as cool as ice. Even when the arrows fly, you act calmly.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses (AC, Fortitude, Reflex and Will).

Name: Winning Smile
Effect: Double your Charisma modifier to Bluff or Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter (or five minutes).

Name: Talk Down
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Perfect Masquerade
Flavor: Your accent and mannerisms are flawless. No matter the task or test, you can fake it.
Requirement: This power cannot be used if you, the target, or any of the target’s allies has taken damage previously in the encounter.
Hit: Your allies gain concealment against the target, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to Bluff checks and can make a Bluff check in place of any knowledge (but not monster knowledge) check until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack.

Name: Sow Distrust
Flavor: You convince an enemy with thrown voices, rocks, or any other diversion to choose another target.
Trigger: A creature makes a ranged attack against you or an adjacent ally.
Hit: The target’s attack is directed to any other target in range and line of sight (your choice).

Name: Smooth Talker
Flavor: You step in during an escalating conversation and attempt to smooth out the ripples of an impending confrontation. If the situation requires, you can also spot a liar.
Effect: Gain a +5 power bonus to your next Bluff, Diplomacy, Insight, or Perception check or your next attack with the Psychic tag.
Special: If you fail the check or miss with the attack, this power is not expended.

Name: Cool Nerves
Flavor: The group is under attack. Tempers are fraying. Someone’s about ready to snap. You blurt out a comical remark that brings it all home.
Effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to Will defense until the end of the encounter. On their next turn, the target can either spend a recovery or gain an additional move action.

Name: Fast-Talk
Flavor: While normal people bog down someone with a lot of useless banter, you get to the point, and it works.
Effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to your next Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check, and you gain a +3 power bonus to all other skill checks with those skills until the end of the encounter (or five minutes).

Name: Empathic Response
Flavor: “I know what you’re going through. This is not the solution. We can make a deal. Just me … just talk to me. You know you can trust me.”
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is marked and cannot make any attack that only includes you until the end of your next turn.

Name: Instant Infatuation
Flavor: You say and do exactly what they want you to say or do, instantly enticing your target.
Range Details: burst 2, one creature you can see
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target suffers a -4 penalty to Will defense and a -4 penalty to attack rolls with attacks that include you.
Miss: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to Will defense against the target’s attacks and a +4 power bonus to Bluff and Diplomacy checks against the target.
Maintain Text: The effects persist until the end of your next turn. You can maintain until you inflict damage on the target or until the target inflicts damage on you.

Name: Read Body Language
Flavor: You read your opponent’s movements and their next course of action. You throw a diversion to prevent concentration.
Trigger: One enemy in burst you can see uses a power.
Hit: The triggering power is expended and the target’s action is lost. If you score a critical hit, the target is also stunned until the start of your next turn.
Special: Spend a recovery as part of this power, but regain no hit points; instead, you recover the use of this power.

Name: I Know This Trick
Flavor: Your enemy attempts a tricky tactic you have been trained to avoid.
Trigger: You are affected by one following conditions that a save can end: dazed, marked, slowed, or stunned.
Effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to saving throws against the triggering condition until you save.

Name: Center of Attention
Effect: You mark all enemies that can see you until the end of your next turn. You lose all benefits of cover or concealment. Until the end of your next turn, basic attacks only require a swift action.

Name: Gruff and Tough
Flavor: You snort and spout a boast about your abilities.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Effect: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn, and you push the target its speed.

Name: Backup Plan
Flavor: You realize things are going badly and act quickly with a backup.
Trigger: You make a Bluff, Diplomacy or Intimidate check and dislike the result.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 3dW extra damage from the attack and is dazed (save ends). On a miss, the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Name: Stunning Good Looks
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target is dazed and helpless, and your allies gain concealment against it. You gain a +10 power bonus to your next Diplomacy or Bluff check against the target and a +5 bonus to all other Diplomacy and Bluff checks until the end of your next turn.
Miss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn and you gain a +3 bonus to all Diplomacy and Bluff checks until the end of your next turn.
Special: If the target takes any damage, they are no longer helpless, though they are still dazed.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. If either the target or you take damage, the effect ends immediately and cannot be maintained.

Name: Method Acting
Flavor: You become the part. You take on the role so flawlessly, the old you is pushed away.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to all Bluff and Intimidate checks and can use Bluff in place of any Intelligence- or Wisdom-based skill.

Name: Unshakable Persona
Flavor: You can recover in an instant, changing course fast enough that listeners didn’t even notice.
Trigger: You make any Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill check and dislike the result.
Effect: You succeed at the roll.

Name: Dazzling Personality
Flavor: You manage to direct your opponent to doing exactly what you wanted, even if your target wasn’t even aware of it.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is controlled until the start of your next turn.

Name: Intimate Assassin
Range Details: burst 1, one creature you can see
Requirement: This power cannot be used if you, the target, or any of the target’s allies has taken damage previously in the encounter.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target is stunned and helpless against your attacks.

Name: Lead the Shot
Flavor: The time for talking is over. You give your ally the sign to end the conversation.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, as an immediate counter action, the target may make any single action available to it. The target gains a +4 power bonus to attack rolls made as part of that action. Before or after your ally acts, you can take a move action.

Name: Butt In
Flavor: You step forward an instant before things go sour and you attempt to cool the situation or at least stall while others prepare.
Requirement: You are not surprised.
Trigger: You roll for initiative.
Effect: Gain a +10 power bonus to initiative. If you act first in an encounter, you gain a standard action which must be used for a power with the Psychic tag.

Name: All Attention
Flavor: You draw the attention of all those around, allowing allies to get into a better position.
Hit: The target is marked and cannot make attacks that do not include you until the end of your next turn. Each ally in burst can shift a number of squares up to their speed.
Effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Name: Feign Mortality
Flavor: You lure your opponent with an award-winning performance faking injury, death, or vulnerability. When your enemy least suspects it, you strike.
Range Details: weapon, the creature that staggered you
Requirement: You are staggered
Effect:
Choose a condition, like helpless or unconscious, or an affliction, like cyanide poisoning or a witch’s curse. You appear to suffer from that condition or affliction. You can drop prone as part of this action. You gain a +10 bonus to Bluff checks to maintain the illusion. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until you make the following attack.  
*Attack:* As an immediate interrupt or as a swift action on your turn, make a basic attack against the target. You automatically score a critical hit, and deal 1dW extra damage.

Name: Touched a Nerve
Flavor: You must have really said something to upset them.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is helpless (save ends). If the target is hit by an attack, they are no longer helpless.

Name: Destructive Criticism
Flavor: You really know what to say to bring someone down.
Hit:
Choose one of the following:  
● The target fails its next saving throw  
● One condition with a finite duration that the target is suffering lasts an additional round.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack. You can maintain until you miss.

Name: Commanding Presence
Flavor: You give the illusion of authority.
Range Details: burst 10, two creatures you can see
Hit: The target is controlled (save ends).

Name: Instinctual Reaction
Flavor: Your intuition tells you where your enemy is most likely to be, where their weaknesses lie, and where to direct your attention to counteract their plan.
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, the target loses all benefits of cover or concealment; superior cover and total concealment is reduced to -2. The target grants combat advantage to one ally in range until the start of your next turn.
Details: A tactical master, you direct your allies to seize victory.

Name: Mark of the Puppeteer
Flavor: You lead the target into another’s threat range.
Effect: Make a basic attack. If you hit, you shunt the target two squares.

Name: Tactical Alteration
Flavor: You outmaneuver your opponent and feign them into a poor strategic position.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is marked by an ally in line of sight to the target. The mark lasts until the target is staggered or until you use *tactical alteration* again.

Name: Distracting Attack
Flavor: You make your foe believe an attack is impending from a flank. You cause it to move from cover.
Trigger: You hit a creature that has cover against you.
Effect: The target grants combat advantage to all allies in eyesight until the start of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot maintain if the target moves from cover.

Name: Into the Fire
Flavor: You rescue an ally from impending doom.
Trigger: You hit a creature.
Effect: The creature you hit is marked until the end of your next turn. Two allies in eyesight shift their speed.

Name: Stick to the Plan
Flavor: Your brilliant maneuver forces enemies into an unwise counter-maneuver.
Hit: Shunt the target 2 squares.
Special: Allies must be willing to be targeted.

Name: Force It Back
Flavor: Converge all attacks on the target and drive it back.
Hit: Until the end of the encounter, each time the target is hit with an attack, you can shunt it 1 square.

Name: Make It Dance
Flavor: You make your foe dive for cover rather than continue their attack.
Trigger: A creature in eyesight moves towards you or an ally.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target. Until the end of your next turn, the target is immobile, and you and all allies in sight gain combat advantage against the target.

Name: Bring Me Everyone
Flavor: Everyone?
Effect: Pull the target 4 squares.

Name: Cover The Escape
Flavor: You provide direct assistance to allow allies to withdraw.
Trigger: You hit a creature.
Effect: The creature you hit takes 1dW extra damage from the triggering attack and, until the end of your next turn, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks or benefit from combat advantage. All allies adjacent to the creature can shift their speed −4.

Name: Encouraging Advice
Flavor: You stand with your allies and support their actions.
Trigger: An ally in range misses the target with an attack.
Hit: The target is hit by the triggering attack.

Name: Back-To-Back
Flavor: They have your back; you have theirs.
Range Details: touch, you and one adjacent ally
Effect: The target makes a basic attack. Until the start of your next turn, the target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense.
Maintain Text: The target repeats the attack and the effect persists. You cannot maintain if you and the targeted ally are no longer in adjacent squares.

Name: Cover Opportunity
Flavor: You take the full force of your enemy’s attack to offer your allies a chance to recover.
Range Details: burst 5, two creatures you can see
Hit: The target is marked until the end of the encounter.
Effect: All allies in eyesight can spend a recovery and heal their recovery value in hit points.

Name: Attract Attention
Flavor: You’ve got to do something stupid in order to save the team.
Effect: All creatures you have marked suffer an additional -2 penalty to attacks that don’t include you until the end of your next turn. All targets you have marked gain a +2 bonus to attack you until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Blind Spot
Flavor: An enemy comes out of nowhere. You make a quick attack before it can assault a comrade.
Trigger: An enemy makes its first attack of the encounter.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target. If you hit, the target takes 1dW extra damage from the attack. The target suffers a -4 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Name: Right into the Trap
Flavor: Your opponent falls perfectly for your taunt. It doesn’t realize its mistake until it’s too late.
Trigger: One ally hits a creature.
Hit: Your ally’s hit becomes a critical hit.

Name: Take the Lead
Flavor: In the absence of proper leadership, you stand up to lead the charge.
Trigger: You hit one creature, and there are no allies closer to this creature than you are.
Effect: The creature is marked until the end of your next turn. While it is marked, if the creature moves in any direction that does not bring it closer to you, you can make a basic attack against it as a counter.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Aggravate the Wound
Flavor: Your attack struck a previous wound the enemy had already sustained, causing further damage.
Trigger: You hit a creature.
Effect: The creature you hit takes 2dW extra damage from the triggering attack, and it fails its next saving throw.

Name: Proud Target
Flavor: Yup, you’re the leader. They know it, even if it isn’t true.
Range Details: burst 10, all enemies you can see
Hit: The target is marked until the end of your next turn. An enemy marked by you that does not include you as a target on its next attack suffers a -3 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack and the bonus to defenses persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Boar’s Head
Flavor: You and your allies move in formation.
Effect: The target moves your speed. Each target must end their move adjacent to at least one other target.

Name: Taunting Mockery
Flavor: You scream obscenities and hurl rocks to anger an opponent.
Effect: You mark the target until the start of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn.

Name: Diverting Attack
Flavor: Your attack causes your enemy to rear its head, allowing others to take the kill shot.
Trigger: You hit a creature.
Hit: You and all allies in sight can score a critical hit against the creature you hit on a natural roll of 18, 19, or 20 until the start of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot maintain if you or any ally scored a critical hit the previous round.

Name: Positive Reinforcement
Flavor: You ally’s attack was far more deadly than even they thought it was.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you damaged this turn
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, you and all allies in sight gain a +6 power bonus to attack rolls with basic attacks against the target.

Name: Subtle Encouragement
Flavor: The enemy doesn’t know it, but you have maneuvered them right where you want them.
Hit: Shunt the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier, and it grants you and all allies combat advantage until the end of your next turn. One ally in eyesight automatically hits with their next at-will or encounter power against the target.

Name: Hearten the Squad
Flavor: There stands the enemy and your group must destroy it.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Effect: All allies in sight and in line of effect to the target automatically hit the target with basic attacks until the start of your next turn.

Name: No Time to Bleed
Flavor: You’re hit but the others can’t see you squirm.
Trigger: You hit one creature that hit you since the start of your last turn.
Effect: The target takes 3dW extra damage from the triggering attack, and you can spend a recovery and heal your recovery value.

Name: Direct Strike
Flavor: You relay important information to allies about approaching threats.
Range Details: burst 10, all enemies you can see
Effect: The target grants combat advantage to you and all allies until the start of your next turn.

Name: Plan of Attack
Flavor: Don’t just all of you run headstrong into a fight. Let’s think this through.
Effect: The target gains a +3 power bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Name: Center Peel
Flavor: You create a diversion and a precious opportunity for a wounded ally to break off and retreat.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the targets are marked and slowed. Allies in range shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier, but must not end their movement adjacent to an enemy.

Name: Direct Threat
Flavor: You stand against the most dangerous opponent on the field.
Range Details: burst 5, one creature you can see
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target can make no attacks that do not include you, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against the target’s attacks, and if the target hits you, you can make a basic attack against it as an immediate reaction.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You can only sustain if you are not staggered.

Name: Target Priority
Flavor: One ally is injured. You goad enemies into shifting their attention.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, all enemies suffer a -4 penalty to attack rolls against the target, and if any enemy hits the target, one ally in eyesight gains a basic attack against that enemy as a counter.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot sustain if the target scores a critical hit on an enemy.

Name: Secure Perimeter
Flavor: You form a circle with your comrades when surrounded by enemies. You make a final stand against the onslaught.
Range Details: burst 3, you and up to four allies
Effect: The target can make a basic attack as an opportunity action against any enemy that approaches within 5 squares of them but is not adjacent. Creatures hit are immobile until the start of the target’s next turn.
Maintain Text: You and allies repeat the attack. You cannot sustain if a target moves 3 squares or further from another target.

Name: Focus Target
Flavor: You order an ally to focus and ignore all distractions.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target gains a +4 power bonus to attack rolls and can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18-20.

Name: On A Pile of Corpses
Flavor: You scream in defiance, standing on a hill built from the bodies of your enemies.
Range Details: burst 10, all enemies you can see
Effect: You mark the target and pull it 4 squares. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 bonus to all defenses, and if any of your marked targets makes an attack that does not include you, the target is helpless against your attacks.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You can only sustain this power once.

Name: Sudden Exposure
Flavor: You scream for an ally to get down, making their foe vulnerable to attack.
Effect:
Shunt one ally adjacent to the target their speed -4.  Make the following attack against the target.  
*Attack:* Intelligence +2 vs Reflex  
*Hit:* The target gains vulnerability to all weapon damage 5 until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: The target gains vulnerability to all weapon damage 5 until the end of your next turn. You cannot sustain if the target is staggered.

Name: Pinpoint Objective
Flavor: You find the most dangerous opponent--the enemy commander or the largest target. Everyone coordinates their attacks.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, all allies in sight gain a +2 bonus to attack and a +5 bonus to damage against the target.
Maintain Text: Until the start of your next turn, each time an ally hits the target, the target takes +5 damage.

Name: Point Of No Return
Flavor: You risk everything, even personal injury, towards the success of the mission.
Effect: The target can spend a recovery. They can either regain hit points or use their recovery value as a damage bonus on their next hit. The target can make an immediate basic attack.

Name: Brilliant Opportunity
Flavor: Your tactical planning has created an opening.
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, when the target hits with an attack, one ally in eyesight makes a basic attack against a target of their choice as a reaction.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You can only sustain once.

Name: Perfect Timing
Flavor: You‘ve planned ahead for this moment. You knew where your enemy would be, where they would strike, and when their weaknesses would be revealed. You give your allies the word and they act according to the plan.
Effect: Once before the start of your next turn, the target can make a basic attack as a counter.

Name: Shining Example
Flavor: Your allies are moved by your bravado.
Effect: You mark the target. Until the end of your next turn, you take no damage from the target’s attacks provided it remains marked by you; instead, grant temporary hit points to one ally in range equal to the damage dealt. An ally cannot receive more temporary hit points than their recovery value. Any target that is out of range by the end of your turn is no longer marked.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot sustain if you are staggered.

Name: Shock And Awe
Flavor: You display overwhelming battle awareness.
Hit: The target is stunned until the start of your next turn.
Effect: You and each ally in burst can shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Intelligence modifier.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack.

Name: Breeze
Hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. *Level 21:* 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Effect: Push the target 2.
Special:
*Augment 1:* Also knock the target prone.  
*Augment 2:* Blast 3.

Name: Ectoplasmic Discharge
Hit: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn. *Level 21:* The target also takes 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage.
Special: *Augment 1:* The target also takes 1d10 + Intelligence modifier damage.

Name: Hidden Blow
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage and you gain concealment against the target until the end of your next turn. *Level 21:* 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage and you gain concealment against the target until the end of your next turn.
Special:
*Augment 2:* 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage and you gain invisibility against the target until the end of your next turn.  
*Augment 4:* 3d8 + Intelligence modifier damage and you gain invisibility against the target until the end of your next turn. Maintain swift.

Name: Night Terrors
Hit: The target is slowed (save ends).
Special:
*Augment 1:* The target is dazed instead (save ends).  
*Augment 2:* The target is dazed (save ends) and makes a basic melee attack against the target of your choice.  
*Augment 4:* Shift the target up to your Intelligence modifier. The target is dazed (save ends) and makes a basic melee attack against the target of your choice.

Name: Hagrider
Hit: The target is controlled (save ends). It remains unconscious for the duration of this power, but if it were to become conscious during the duration then it becomes conscious immediately after the duration ends.

Name: Sleepyheads
Hit: The target is slowed (save ends). *Aftereffect:* The target is unconscious (save ends).
Miss: The target is slowed (save ends).

Name: Incept Idea
Hit: You put a thought in the target's head.

Name: Shift Resistance
Hit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
Effect: Select one of the target's resistances, immunities or vulnerabilities. Change it to a different damage type until the end of the encounter.

Name: Intangible Wings
Effect: You gain flight 6. At the beginning of each of your turns, make a saving throw. If you fail, this power comes to an end.

Name: Dream Dive
Hit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier damage. You share a space with the target until the end of your next turn, and during that time cannot be the target of attacks or other powers. At the end of their turn, the target can attempt a saving throw to end this effect early. At the end of the duration, you appear in an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.
Effect: If used on an ally, you do no damage and do not need to make the attack roll.

Name: Bad Dream
Effect: You become helpless until the beginning of your next turn. At the beginning of your next turn, you can spend up to three recoveries, healing your recovery value each turn. All conditions and persistent damage with save-ends durations end.

Name: Lucidity
Effect: You gain truesight 10 until your next short rest.

Name: Nightmare Colossus
Hit: Conjure a terrifying illusion. 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage and push the target 3.
Effect: Make the attack against one creature per turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack.

Name: Chrysalis
Effect: You gain temporary HP equal to your level plus your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Push Explosion
Trigger: A Far attack is made.
Effect: Move the Far attack's origin point up to your Wisdom modifier squares. Then the attack takes place.

Name: Mass Synesthesia
Hit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier damage and the target is dazed and the only attacks they can make are basic attacks (save ends both).

Name: Boundless Possibilities
Effect: Each time you roll a d20, roll twice and choose the option you prefer. If any creature rolls a natural 20 for any roll, this power changes. Now you roll twice and choose the lower result. This power swaps back if any creature rolls a natural 20 again.

Name: Head Trip
Hit: 4d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage and you become incorporeal and invisible. Make a save at the end of each of your turns, on a failure you stop being incorporeal and invisible. If the target falls unconscious, you stop being incorporeal and invisible immediately.

Name: Sleep's Fatal Embrace
Hit: You consign the targets to the Plane of Dreams. They disappear and take 20 ongoing psychic damage (save ends both).

Name: Chapter
Sources: Magician (class), Worships the God of Tyranny (kit)
Details: You can enchant, influence and dominate the weaker willed.

Name: Befuddle
Flavor: Your mental influence clouds your opponent’s concentration.
Hit: The target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Name: Neural Spear
Flavor: You scour the target’s mind.
Hit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.  
*Level 21:* 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Name: Instant Friends
Flavor: Don’t you remember me? We’re old pals.
Hit: The target treats you as a friend and cannot attack you until the end of your next turn. You can use your Bluff skill to convince the target to do something for you, as per normal rules for Bluff. The effect ends immediately if you make an attack that damages the target.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. On a hit the duration is extended until the end of your next turn.

Name: Recall Probe
Flavor: You sift through the target’s memories, searching for the needed one.
Hit: 2d4 + your Wisdom modifier psychic damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. You search the target’s mind for a specific memory. Make an Arcana check: DC 20 for a memory 24 hours old or less, DC 25 for a week old and DC 30 for up to a month old (GM’s discretion for older memories).
Miss: The power is not expended, but you cannot use it on the same target until after your next long rest.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against an eligible target.

Name: Dreamtrancer
Flavor: You move through the netherscape of untapped subconscious to communicate with someone else.
Range Details: one unconscious creature you have met
Effect: You enter the target’s dream until the start of your next turn. You can communicate with the target, convince it you are real or not. Once on your turn, make a Wisdom vs Will attack if you wish to take control of the dream: otherwise, you can only control your dream body and anything you can directly affect with it. If you take control of the dream, the target can attempt a Wisdom or Charisma vs Will attack at the start of its next turn to regain control. If you inflict harm on the target or the target inflicts harm on itself, it wakes up: however, if you are in control of the dream, the target can only harm itself if you wish it. While you are in the dream, you can take no actions outside of it. If you suffer damage in reality, the effect ends.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the start of your next turn. You cannot maintain if the target wakes up.

Name: Imprint
Flavor: You wave your hand and suddenly a piece of paper looks like a letter from the king, a copper coin looks like a gold coin, or a rock looks like a diamond. Surely there are other applications, but you can’t think of any.
Effect: You make one object look like something else of the same approximate size and shape. The illusion only affects the object’s visual qualities. Observers can make a Perception check opposed by your Bluff check to identify the illusion. The effect lasts until you dismiss it as a free action, or until you stop touching the object.

Name: Long Range Communication
Flavor: You concentrate and transmit a simple message over a vast distance.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Effect: You transmit a message of 25 words or less that only the target will hear.

Name: Indirect Camouflage
Flavor: The best disguise is the one established in the mind.
Hit: You disguise your appearance until the end of your next turn, making you look like someone else. The details of your appearance are up to you. You gain a +5 bonus to Bluff checks related to the disguise.
Maintain Text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn. You cannot maintain for longer than five minutes.

Name: All a Jumble
Flavor: The target mixes up their target and ends attacking their best friend. That won’t go over well.
Trigger: A creature makes a ranged attack against you or an adjacent ally.
Hit: The target attacks a different creature of your choice within its attack’s range.

Name: Cut the Strings
Flavor: The target’s eyes roll back and they take a nice long nap.
Hit: The target falls unconscious until the end of your next turn. If it suffers any damage, it immediately wakes up.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can continue to maintain even after the encounter ends. While you are not in an encounter, each time you maintain this power, the target  is unconscious for one hour or until it suffers damage.

Name: Reverberation
Flavor: You create a sound everyone thinks they hear.
Hit: The target is distracted and grants combat advantage to all creatures until the end of your next turn.

Name: Direct Manipulation
Flavor: You push the target’s brain aside and take direct control of the target.
Hit: The target is controlled until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can continue to maintain even after the encounter ends. While you are not in an encounter, each time you maintain this power, the target is controlled for one hour.

Name: Making Matters Worse
Flavor: You’re already wiggling around their mind. Might as well cut a few nerves.
Range Details: range, one creature that has just taken damage from a Psychic power you used
Effect:
The target takes an additional 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and is weakened until the end of your next turn.
> *Level 15:* 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
> *Level 25:* 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Name: Deep Scan
Flavor: You attempt to scan the thoughts of someone you cannot see.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Hit: You are able to scan the surface thoughts of the target, revealing its current location and what it is doing.
Special: No attack necessary against a willing target.

Name: Instill Confidence
Flavor: You make someone feel just awesome.
Effect: The target gains a +5 bonus to all skill checks for five minutes.

Name: Psychic Refresh
Flavor: You are not like other people, limited in their uses of things.
Effect: Recover the use of one of your encounter powers.

Name: Visual Deletion
Flavor: Although you can still make a noise, your opponents have no other ways to locate you.
Hit: You are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against any targets you hit last turn.

Name: Act Casual
Flavor: No one suspects a thing.
Hit: The target is controlled (save ends), but not dazed (enabling you to use more than one of its actions) and the target doesn’t grant combat advantage unless you wish them to.

Name: Neural Slice
Flavor: You send out a cascade of psychic energy to affect all those around.
Hit: The target is dazed, immobile, and weakened (save ends all).
Miss: The target is dazed, immobile, and weakened until the start of your next turn.

Name: Telepathic Blocker
Flavor: You go on the defense to ensure you don’t suffer from any effects you yourself are known for.
Effect: You gain a +4 bonus to Will defense for 5 minutes.

Name: Blackout
Flavor: You cut off every sense in your opponent. You suppose they could still smell you.
Hit: The target is blinded and deafened (save ends).
Miss: The target is blinded and deafened until the start of your next turn.

Name: Transplant Senses
Flavor: You can either look through someone else’s eyes or force their vision through your own.
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, you either look through the targets eyes or you force the target to see what you see. While looking through the target’s eyes, you may choose whether or not the target is aware of your use of this power. While looking through the target’s eyes, you grant combat advantage to all creatures: while looking through yours, the target grants combat advantage to all creatures and may not be able to see certain targets in order to attack them. If the target takes damage, the effect ends.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can continue to maintain even after the encounter ends. While you are not in an encounter, each time you maintain this power, the effect remains for one hour or until you end it as a swift action.

Name: Field Control
Flavor: This feels more like a tabletop wargame and these are your troops.
Hit: The target is controlled until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against any targets you hit last turn.

Name: Phrenic Cascade
Flavor: You simply cause havoc in the target’s brain.
Hit:
5d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
*Level 27:* 7d10 + Wisdom modifier damage

Name: Godly String
Flavor: No matter where they go, no matter where they hide, you can get at them.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Hit: The target is controlled (save ends).

Name: Pure Puppeteer
Flavor: You convince the target that what you wish is all that matters. You are nothing less than a god and they will do anything and everything in your name.
Hit: The target is under your control until the end of your next turn. This is identical to being controlled, except you can activate rechargeable, encounter, and daily powers. You can command the target to attack allies or itself (if possible).
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can continue to maintain even after the encounter ends. While you are not in an encounter, each time you maintain this power, the effect remains for one hour.

Name: Personality Manipulation
Flavor: Until now, everything you have done has been temporary. People would wake up and feel the fool. Now, there is nothing holding you back … this is that moment where you need to decide which side you’re really on.
Hit: You rewrite the target’s personality so that it is convinced you and your allies are its allies until the end of your next turn. You have no direct control over the target but are able to give it instructions which it will try to follow to the best of its abilities.
Maintain Text: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can continue to maintain even after the encounter ends. While you are not in an encounter, each time you maintain this power, the effect remains for one day.

Name: Chapter
Details: You use the divine power of the sun to blast and dazzle your enemies and heal your allies.

Name: Dismiss
Flavor: This attack ‘softly’ removes an enemy from your presence.
Hit:
1dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and the target is pushed 2 squares. 
*Level 21:* 2dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and the target is pushed 2 squares.
Special: If the target is undead, they are pushed 4 squares on a hit instead.

Name: Expose Weakness
Flavor: You strike with a weak, but swift, attack that hampers an opponent.
Hit: The creature is weakened and slowed (save ends both).

Name: Staunching Strike
Flavor: To help your allies and harm your enemies is the most basic tenet of the Radiant Dawn discipline.
Hit: 2dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You or an ally within sight can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.

Name: Spoils of War
Flavor: Might makes right.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time an ally within 3 hits with an attack, they heal damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Decree of Mercy
Flavor: A simple look and gesture can weaken one’s resolve to kill.
Hit: Attacks the target makes until the end of your next turn are nonlethal.

Name: Bolster
Flavor: You fortify an ally with akasha, hardening their skin like the scales of a dragon.
Effect: The ally gains resistance to all 5 until the end of your next turn. *Level 11:* 10. *Level 21:* 15.

Name: The Caged Sun
Effect: You cannot heal creatures other than yourself, or enable other creatures to spend recoveries. However, all healing you receive is doubled. If you receive healing but are already at maximum HP, you gain that amount as temporary HP instead.
Special: If you are staggered, you can enter this stance as a reaction.

Name: Curate’s Strike
Flavor: This strike was created by a kobold leader to fight both controlling magics and vicious wounds.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You or an ally within sight can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value. They also gain a +2 bonus on saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Name: Decree of Purity
Flavor: A single word and a wave of the hand purifies those who would stand with you.
Effect: The target makes a saving throw against persistent damage or a condition with a save ends duration.

Name: Healer’s Bane
Flavor: You hijack healing for your own purpose.
Trigger: The creature is about to heal.
Effect: The creature does not heal, but does lose a recovery. Pick an ally within range. They heal equal to their recovery value.

Name: Witness to Glory
Flavor: With a surge of akasha, you spur an ally into battle.
Trigger: Initiative is rolled.
Effect: The ally receives a +4 power bonus to initiative. They add your Wisdom modifier to their speed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Armaments of the Empire
Flavor: A thin layer of akasha flows forth from you and covers your and your allies’ weapons.
Hit: 2dW + Wisdom modifier damage.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, all allies within 5 squares gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls.

Name: Decree of Death
Flavor: You single out targets for execution.
Hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Disrupt Essence
Flavor: A powerful blow that disrupts one’s essence, inhibiting the use of abilities.
Hit: 2dW + Wisdom modifier damage and the target cannot use encounter, daily or refresh powers until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lifeburst Strike
Flavor: You strike out with a simple blow with an uncanny power to heal and harm.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, if an ally of yours hits the target, the ally heals 10 damage.
Miss: Half damage, and no healing effect.
Maintain Text: The healing effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Decree of Silence
Flavor: Your presence demands silence.
Trigger: You are the target of a near or far attack.
Effect: Creatures in the area of this power cannot be targeted by the attack.

Name: Lifeburst Imbuement
Flavor: This maneuver imbues another to carry out your will.
Effect: The next attack the ally makes has combat advantage, and does 3d8 additional radiant damage on a hit.

Name: Sunstroke
Flavor: Your akasha shapes an attack into a powerful solar flare.
Hit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant and fire damage and persistent fire damage 10 (save ends).
Miss: Half damage, and no persistent damage.
Effect: One ally in the burst can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.

Name: Shatter Spell
Flavor: You bring a spell or other magical effect to an unceremonious end.
Effect: The power comes to an end.

Name: Sunlight Shields
Flavor: Your stance sits halfway between martial form and magic prowess, conjuring shields of light to defend yourself and others.
Effect: Allies in or adjacent to the wall get a +2 power bonus to AC. An enemy that moves into the wall stops moving immediately and cannot move for the rest of the turn. Walls created last until the end of your next turn.
Maintain Text: Conjure a new wall within range, which lasts until the end of your next turn. This does not prolong the duration of any existing walls you conjured with this power. You cannot conjure the new wall in the same location as an existing wall.

Name: Divide and Conquer
Flavor: This strike pulls essence from the target, creating an effigy of the creature.
Hit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and conjure an effigy of the target in an unoccupied square in range. Any attack that targets the effigy targets the target as well, even if the target would normally be out of range of the attack. The target only gets targeted once by any given attack, even if both the target and their effigy are in the area of effect.

Name: Battle Against the Sun
Flavor: To challenge you is to challenge the sun itself: An exercise in futility.
Effect:
You conjure a miniature sun, which occupies one square. The sun casts bright light in a 2-square radius. The sun remains until the end of your next turn.  It makes a ranged attack in each of your turns where it exists, including this turn.. On your turns, you may spend a move action to move the sun up to 4 squares.  
*Attack:* Ranged 5, one enemy; your Wisdom vs Reflex; 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Maintain Text: The sun remains until the end of your next turn.

Name: Noblesse Oblige
Flavor: When all else fails, your allies turn to you to save them.
Trigger: An enemy reduces your ally to 0 HP or below with an attack.
Hit: 3dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect: The triggering ally can spend a recovery and heal 1 damage, plus they heal equal to the damage done by your attack (if any).
Special: Before the attack, you can shift up to your Strength modifier squares.

Name: Decree of Freedom
Flavor: With a gesture and a single word, you cause a target’s essence to flare, freeing them from their bonds.
Effect: The target ignores all conditions and persistent damage it is affected by until the end of your next turn. It can also ignore any zones or difficult or hazardous terrain during the same period. The target does not make saving throws during this effect, but the time elapsed does count towards the duration of effects.

Name: Awaken the Sleeper
Flavor: It’s said that the soul of a mortal contains power that can rival the gods, and this maneuver awakens a fraction of that power for a brief moment.
Effect: Select one of your unexpended encounter or daily powers that takes a standard, move, swift or free action. Your ally can use that power. They also gain temporary HP equal to your recovery value.

Name: King’s Castle
Flavor: Your faithful respond to your call for help.
Trigger: An enemy within range hits your ally with an attack.
Hit: 4d10 + Wisdom radiant damage.
Effect: You or a willing ally within range teleports to the triggering ally’s space, and the triggering ally teleports to the space you/the other ally just left. The one teleported to the space takes the hit instead of the triggering ally.

Name: Swords into Ploughshares
Flavor: This blow marks an enemy with a simple brand that burrows into their essence. Their strikes heal and harm in equal measure.
Hit: 3dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
